overview: Starring BiBi Jones! In This Halfway Home, Bibi Is Going All The Way! After doing time for a heist gone wrong, the beautiful BiBi Jones gets a shot at redemption. All she has to do is hold out in a Halfway House full of lustful women. But when her past comes back to haunt her, she has to fight her old instincts or give in to temptation!
title: Halfway Home
